column1: review_text
The service was really fast, probably because I ordered ahead of time.  The taste was typical Data Beans.
I was in and out in no time. The line moved incredibly quickly. The barista even remembered my name when I came back to pick up my latte.
I go to this location every day and I have consistently had a great experience. The drinks are made quickly and accurately, and the location is very clean and comfortable.
The staff were extremely slow and the service was terrible.  It took over 30 minutes to prepare my drink and it was wrong when I got it.  I will not be returning.
The coffee here always tastes fresh.  When I'm visiting this location, I like to sit back and enjoy the delicious assortment of flavors.
Coffee is often cold and I have to wait 30+ min in line.
I had an unpleasant visit today. The location was filthy with tables not cleaned and trash on the floor.
I like the variety of alternative milks offered here and the friendly greeting from the staff.
Love the atmosphere, the staff was super friendly and got my coffee exactly as I ordered. Would defenetly recomend trying their cold brew with oat milk.
I enjoyed the experience, quick service, fast wait time, clean restrooms, and a variety of milk for my coffee.
